level.text: A two-step sealed bidding method may be used for procurements requiring technical proposals, particularly those involving complex procurements.
The two-step sealed bidding method shall be conducted as follows:
The first step shall involve the solicitation of technical proposals, evaluation of proposals, and if necessary, discussions of the proposals; and
The second step shall involve the submission of sealed bid prices by those who submitted acceptable technical proposals in step one.
The contracting officer shall not request, and a bidder shall not submit, price or price information in step one.
The contracting officer shall determine the acceptability of the goods or services offered through clarification and discussion, if necessary, relating to technical proposals.
Bids submitted shall be evaluated and awards made in accordance with the provisions of this chapter.
